00037 typedef enum { fbspl_undef, fbspl_bootup, fbspl_reboot, fbspl_shutdown, fbspl_suspend, fbspl_resume } fbspl_type_t;
00038 
00039 typedef struct
00040 {
00041         char reqmode;   /* a combination of SPL_MODE_ flags */
00042         char *theme;    /* theme */
00043         char *message;  /* system message */

00046         int tty_s;              /* silent tty */
00047         int tty_v;              /* verbose tty */
00048         char *pidfile;  /* pidfile */
00049         fbspl_type_t type;      /* bootup/reboot/shutdown? */
00050         bool textbox_visible;   /* show the textbox? */
00051 
00052         /* rc system data */
00053         bool profile;   /* enable profiling? */
00054         bool insane;    /* skip sanity checks? */
00055         bool vonerr;    /* switch to verbose on errors? */
00056         char *xservice; /* name of the service that starts X */
00057 
00058         /* daemon data */
00059         bool minstances;        /* allow multiple instances of the splash daemon? */
00060         int progress;           /* current value of progress */
00061         char verbosity;         /* verbosity level */
00062         int autoverbose;        /* autoverbose delay in seconds; 0 if disabled */
00063 } fbspl_cfg_t;
